title: I Just Don't Trust Them
alt: I believe in getting immunity the old-fashioned way: By letting a bat virus take control of my lungs and turn my face into a disgusting plague fountain while my immune system desperately Googles 'how to make spike protein antibodies'.
transcript:
[Cueball stands with his arms to his sides, facing Megan.]
Cueball: I just don't trust them, and I don't want to put something they developed into my body.[Caption below the panel]:
How I feel about bats
